properties.name: Key
properties.description: The key of a key-value pair that identifies the location of an attachment to a document.

type.description: The key of a key-value pair that identifies the location of an attachment to a document.

properties.name: Name
properties.description: The name of the document attachment file.

type.description: The name of the document attachment file.

properties.name: Values
properties.description: The value of a key-value pair that identifies the location of an attachment to a document. The format for Value depends on the type of key you specify.

type.description: The value of a key-value pair that identifies the location of an attachment to a document. The format for Value depends on the type of key you specify.

properties.name: Name
properties.description: The name of the required SSM document. The name can be an Amazon Resource Name (ARN).

type.description: The name of the required SSM document. The name can be an Amazon Resource Name (ARN).

properties.name: Version
properties.description: The document version required by the current document.

type.description: The document version required by the current document.

resource.description: The AWS::SSM::Document resource is an SSM document in AWS Systems Manager that defines the actions that Systems Manager performs, which can be used to set up and run commands on your instances.

properties.name: Attachments
properties.description: A list of key and value pairs that describe attachments to a version of a document.

type.description: A list of key and value pairs that describe attachments to a version of a document.

properties.name: Content
properties.description: The content for the Systems Manager document in JSON, YAML or String format.

types.description: The content for the Systems Manager document in JSON, YAML or String format.
The content for the Systems Manager document in JSON, YAML or String format.

properties.name: DocumentFormat
properties.description: Specify the document format for the request. The document format can be either JSON or YAML. JSON is the default format.

type.description: Specify the document format for the request. The document format can be either JSON or YAML. JSON is the default format.

properties.name: DocumentType
properties.description: The type of document to create.

type.description: The type of document to create.

properties.name: Name
properties.description: A name for the Systems Manager document.

type.description: A name for the Systems Manager document.

properties.name: Requires
properties.description: A list of SSM documents required by a document. For example, an ApplicationConfiguration document requires an ApplicationConfigurationSchema document.

type.description: A list of SSM documents required by a document. For example, an ApplicationConfiguration document requires an ApplicationConfigurationSchema document.

properties.name: Tags
properties.description: Optional metadata that you assign to a resource. Tags enable you to categorize a resource in different ways, such as by purpose, owner, or environment.

type.description: Optional metadata that you assign to a resource. Tags enable you to categorize a resource in different ways, such as by purpose, owner, or environment.

properties.name: TargetType
properties.description: Specify a target type to define the kinds of resources the document can run on.

type.description: Specify a target type to define the kinds of resources the document can run on.

properties.name: UpdateMethod
properties.description: Update method - when set to 'Replace', the update will replace the existing document; when set to 'NewVersion', the update will create a new version.

type.description: Update method - when set to 'Replace', the update will replace the existing document; when set to 'NewVersion', the update will create a new version.

properties.name: VersionName
properties.description: An optional field specifying the version of the artifact you are creating with the document. This value is unique across all versions of a document, and cannot be changed.

type.description: An optional field specifying the version of the artifact you are creating with the document. This value is unique across all versions of a document, and cannot be changed.
